info.name: Quadratic Bezier - 3D
info.description: Intersecting quadratic Bezier segments in 3D. Used Microsoft's paper as pointed out by tayholliday in https://www.shadertoy.com/view/XsX3zf. Since 3D quadratic Bezier segments are planar, the 2D version can be used to compute the distance to 3D curves.
